name: Silicon-Galaxy
description:
Split screen 1v1 stellar action!

Lasers,Guided Missiles, Atomic devices. Do you need even more?

---->    MULTIPLAYER ONLY    <----

1 on 1 Multiplayer Beta version of the game for the Spain Game Dev Jam II

Playable with two XBOX 360 controllers or keyboard only.

Player 1 Controls:

ARROWS for aim +J I O P for throttle and weapons 

Player 2 Controls:

A W E R for aim + D C X V for throttle and weapons
